title: Arthur Fisher (rugby league)
text: Arthur Fisher is a former professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1940s and 1950s. He played at club level for <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Castleford%20Tigers%20players">Heritage № 298</a>).
